entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:26 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 8:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 6.9°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 6.8°C
Wind: SSW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
